initial_classification.description: initial classification of surgery description into categories
initial_classification.system_prompt: You are a helpful medical assistant with expertise in surgery and oncology.
initial_classification.user_prompt: Classify the following surgical procedure into one of these purpose categories: {classes}. The procedure description is {DATA}. Report only a single category name and nothing else.

refinement.description: refinement of initial classification in thinking mode
refinement.system_prompt: You are a helpful medical assistant with expertise in surgery and oncology.
refinement.user_prompt: Refine the initial classification of the surgical procedure into one of these purpose categories: {classes}. The procedure description is {DATA}. It is initially classified as {INITIAL_CLASSIFICATION_RESULT}. Once you've reached a final answer, report only a single category name and nothing else.
